text: É ɓɛɛni nuiti saama, é vulua é ɗa suaiti daaʋokɔɠɔ, é zeini dɔɓɔ zoovalegiti saama, é ɗa tufai mi ga nikɛiti kɛʋele, geezu nɔɗagi ɗa zɛɓɛ, eyɛsu foloi é kwɛɛni la ga GALAGI nii é Anii-Pɛ-Unda, naa ɠa é ga nuɓusɛiti ta-masadaiti ti-maliɠii, ta toɠa ɗa naama nui zei masadai zu, nii é pɔ.
